message: perhaps this is the normal type of formatting, and perhaps it is just my account or something I did, but the formatting of my reply doesn't text wrap and is in an odd font, and ideas?
is it just me, or does my latest reply (starting with @energpanacea) have some very odd formatting about it?

@GabrielMtn hi, currently this behavior is expected (see https://convore.com/feedback/convore-feature-wish-list/). when you copy/paste multiline text it gets displayed in fixed width font (useful for exchanging source code). you can also enter this manually by using shift-enter
